Welcome to Chitose's documentation!
===================================

`Chitose <https://github.com/mnogu/chitose>`_ is a Python client library for `the AT Protocol <https://atproto.com/>`_ (`Bluesky <https://blueskyweb.xyz/>`_).

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
